page.title: 14Local Survey
page.content:
Our Goegraphy teacher has been working with other schools in the county to produce a set of information for each parish in our county.We used the shool computer to discover these details about Upton and Willingham.
{Upton}1951 Population 222 1961 Population 570 1971 Population 336 1981 Population 319 In 1981 there were 166 males living in the village and 153 females. The breakdown of age groups is something else that is quite interesting. Age 0-4:8 people Age 5-14:58 people Age 15-34:63 people Age 34-Retiring:109 people Age Ret.-74:37 people Agev74+:17 people
